name: ios-entitlement-transform
description: Transform Entitlement Property of your iOS entitlements.plist file at build time.
author: Andrew Hoefling

inputs.name: sourcePath
inputs.label: iOS entitlements.plist File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full path to iOS entitlements.plist file.

inputs.name: property
inputs.label: Property Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The property that you would like to update.

inputs.name: value
inputs.label: Value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The new value to insert into the Entitlment Property.

inputs.name: printFile
inputs.label: Print File
inputs.helpMarkDown: If you would like to print the file contents before and after changing variables.
